pr_title: Rename segmentPushType and SegmentPushFrequency to segmentIngestionType and segmentIngestionFrequency

timeline.bodyText: Alternative suggest" segmentIngestionFrequency and segmentIngestionType, since "load" has the connotation of a segment being loaded in memory. Especially with the recent proposal for a segment to be in "deep store" vs "loaded"
timeline.author: mcvsubbu

replies.bodyText: make sense, i will make the change
replies.author: xiangfu0

timeline.message: Rename segmentPushType and SegmentPushFrequency to segmentIngestionType and segmentIngestionFrequency
Rename segmentPushType and SegmentPushFrequency to segmentIngestionType and segmentIngestionFrequency
